txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Pitted finger bones from the wights in Barrow-downs. Deliver the items to Second-watcher Heathstraw at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
'Looks like the scholars will have something to study after all. Thank you.'
'This is a very strange request, but one that I will fulfill. Scholars want to study the bones of the things said to be creeping about the Barrow-downs.'
Men of Bree Task:  Pitted Finger Bones
Second-watcher Heathstraw is offering compensation for the collection of pitted finger bones from the wights in the Barrow-downs.
Deliver the pitted finger bones to Second-watcher Heathstraw
You have been tasked with finding pitted finger bones from the wights in the Barrow-downs. Second-watcher Heathstraw awaits the delivery of these items at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
Wanted: Pitted finger bones from the wights in Barrow-downs.
